8.5-10.0.message: High confidence validation. Contract automatically approved.

7.0-8.4.message: Validation passed with small gaps. Ready for human review.

5.0-6.9.message: Validation incomplete. Address missing data before approval.
blockers: Must resolve UNKNOWN items by adding data to ARCHITECTURE.md
Must address FAIL items by migrating to approved stack or registering exceptions via LADES2

0.0-4.9.message: Insufficient information or critical compliance failures. Cannot proceed.
blockers: Critical data missing from ARCHITECTURE.md Section 8
Non-compliant technology stack without exception documentation

remediation_guidance.FAIL_items: Register exception via LADES2 process (create ADR in Section 12 with business justification, technical rationale, alternatives, risk assessment, and obtain chapter approval) OR migrate to approved technology stack
remediation_guidance.UNKNOWN_items: Add missing data to ARCHITECTURE.md Section 8 (Technology Stack). Include specific versions, tools, and deployment platforms.
remediation_guidance.completeness_below_threshold: Complete all required sections in ARCHITECTURE.md before submitting for approval. Focus on Section 8 (Technology Stack) and Section 12 (ADRs) for Development Architecture compliance.
remediation_guidance.low_quality_score: Improve source traceability by ensuring all data points reference specific ARCHITECTURE.md sections and line numbers.
